message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Can we meet in the middle at $900000?

I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm afraid $900000 is still below my minimum asking price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target. I'll counteroffer at $1100000. This is the lowest I can go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $1100000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $950000, but I need to get closer to my target. Can we meet in the middle at $1025000?

I understand that you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1100000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my target. I'll counteroffer at $1075000. This is the lowest I can go without compromising the value of the product.
